title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 203-1.2 - Measurements, abbreviations and acronyms
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 203-1.2 - Measurements, abbreviations and acronyms

State Regulations
(a) ASME: American Society of Mechanical

Engineers
(b) CH4: Methane
(c) FID: Flame Ionization Detector
(d) LDAR: Leak Detection and Repair
(e) OGI: Optical Gas Imaging
(f) PTE: Potential to Emit
(g) psig: pounds per square inch, gauge
(h) scfh: standard cubic feet
per hour
(i) scfm: standard cubic
feet per minute
(j) tpy: tons per
year
(k) VOC: volatile organic
compound

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
203-1.2

Adopted

New

York State Register February 16, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 07, eff. 3/3/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
